text: Derek Tsang(曾國祥, born 8 November 1979) is an actor, director and screenwriter from Hong Kong. He is Eric Tsang's son. He appeared in The Thieves movie. ==References== == Other websites == * Official blog * Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:Hong Kong actors Category:Chinese movie actors Category:Chinese movie directors Category:Chinese screenwriters Category:21st- century Chinese actors Category:21st-century Chinese writers
title: Derek Tsang
